hat.wolf.desc_short: A headdress made out of the scraped out head of a wolf.

discord.trophy.desc_short: A companion that reminds you of your youth.

fogmachine.desc_short: A Fog machine which runs on low grade fuel. Can be set to fill an area with a dense fog or triggered by motion.

strobelight.desc_short: A flashing light, 3 speeds. Causes seizures.

attackhelicopter.desc_short: A fairly solid helicopter with weapons capability.

kayak.desc_short: An improvised wooden kayak. Seats two and requires a Paddle to operate.

horse.armor.roadsign.desc_short: A full body armor for a horse. Provides strong protection for you and your steed, at the cost of greatly reduced movement speed.

horse.armor.wood.desc_short: A full body armor for a horse made of wood. Provides moderate protection for you and your steed, but with a reduction in movement speed.

horse.saddle.double.desc_short: A horse saddle with two seats. Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the "Claim" option

horse.saddle.desc_short: Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the "Claim" option

horse.saddle.single.desc_short: A horse saddle with one seat. Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the "Claim" option

horse.saddlebag.desc_short: Equipping this saddle bag will add extra storage space on your horse

horse.shoes.advanced.desc_short: Equipping these horse shoes will grant your horse additional movement speed

horse.shoes.basic.desc_short: Equipping these horse shoes will grant your horse additional movement speed

aiming.module.mlrs.desc_short: An aiming system computer module for an MLRS vehicle.

ammo.rocket.mlrs.desc_short: A rocket intended for use in an MLRS (Multiple Launch Rocket System).

ballista.bolt.hammerhead.desc_short: Heavy and solid bolt for a ballista, designed to hammer through doors.

ballista.bolt.incendiary.desc_short: A fire-tipped bolt for a ballista, wrapped in burning cloth, ignites upon impact.

ballista.bolt.piercer.desc_short: A piercing bolt for a ballista, capable of penetrating armored vehicles.

ballista.bolt.pitchfork.desc_short: A wide-impact bolt for a ballista, covering a large area while dealing moderate damage.

ballista.mounted.desc_short: A ballista mounted on wheels, designed for mobility and capable of firing bolts at distant targets. Can be towed by horses.

ballista.static.desc_short: A stationary ballista, perfect for defence. Can fire deadly bolts at distant targets.

batteringram.desc_short: A reinforced siege weapon built for smashing through wooden and stone constructions with brute force. Must be repaired with high quality metal to keep functioning.

catapult.ammo.bee.desc_short: A bunch of Bee Grenades in a single catapult projectile. Creates swarms of Bees on impact.

catapult.ammo.explosive.desc_short: An explosive propane-filled keg, devastating to structures. Can be placed or used as a projectile in a catapult.

catapult.ammo.incendiary.desc_short: A crude firebomb made of fuel-filled jugs wrapped in a net. Can be placed or used as a projectile in a catapult.

catapult.ammo.boulder.desc_short: A cluster of heavy rock projectiles for a catapult. Wide spread, pure kinetic damage on impact.

catapult.desc_short: An improvised catapult siege weapon. Built for flinging destructive projectiles with questionable accuracy. Can be towed by horses.

siegetower.desc_short: A rolling siege tower, providing cover and access to enemy bases. Can be locked with your own door. Can be towed by horses.

snowmobile.desc_short: A custom snowmobile, made of various bits and pieces.

workcart.desc_short: A service train designed to run on an underground rail system.

arrow.hv.desc_short: Lighter, faster arrow that deals less damage.

arrow.wooden.desc_short: An arrow for a Hunting Bow and Crossbow.

arrow.bone.desc_short: An Arrow equipped with a large bone arrowhead making it very easy to hit targets at the expense of damage

arrow.fire.desc_short: A fuel soaked arrow, ignite it by aiming.

dart.incapacitate.desc_short: A dart that slows your target and blocks their vision briefly.

dart.radiation.desc_short: A dart that applies stackable radiation.

dart.scatter.desc_short: A spread shot dart that fires multiple smaller darts.

ammo.pistol.desc_short: Ammunition for a Pistol. Loses velocity when fired over long distances resulting in slightly decreased damage.

ammo.pistol.fire.desc_short: Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.

ammo.pistol.hv.desc_short: This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage when fired over long distances.

ammo.rifle.desc_short: Ammunition for a Rifle. Loses velocity when fired over long distances resulting in slightly decreased damage.

ammo.rifle.explosive.desc_short: This ammo explodes on contact dealing a small amount of fragmentation damage to nearby objects.

ammo.rifle.incendiary.desc_short: Slower moving ammunition that deals fire damage. There's a small chance it will start a fire.

ammo.rifle.hv.desc_short: This ammunition travels faster, resulting in less drop and slightly higher damage when fired over long distances.

ammo.rocket.basic.desc_short: Ammunition for a Rocket Launcher. A short to medium range self-propelled, unguided rocket which deals large splash damage on impact.

ammo.rocket.hv.desc_short: Fast moving rocket ammunition. Short to medium range self-propelled, unguided rocket which deals large splash damage on impact but less damage than a normal rocket.

ammo.rocket.seeker.desc_short: Fast moving rocket ammunition. Uses a type of radar for active target guidance from a Homing Launcher

ammo.rocket.smoke.desc_short: Emits thick, visibility blocking smoke upon impact.

ammo.shotgun.slug.desc_short: Single large projectile for a Shotgun.

submarine.torpedo.straight.desc_short: A torpedo for use in a submarine. Fires ahead in a straight line.

door.double.hinged.metal.desc_short: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.

door.double.hinged.toptier.desc_short: Extremely strong door with a hatch to see and shoot out of.

door.double.hinged.wood.desc_short:
A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.

door.hinged.metal.desc_short: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.

door.hinged.toptier.desc_short: Extremely strong door with a hatch to see and shoot out of.

door.hinged.wood.desc_short:
A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.

floor.grill.desc_short: A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.

floor.ladder.hatch.desc_short: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.

floor.triangle.grill.desc_short: A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.

floor.triangle.ladder.hatch.desc_short: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.

gates.external.high.adobe.desc_short: A high stone gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.

gates.external.high.legacy.desc_short: A legacy themed wooden gate to keep the untamed wilderness away from your property, it's seen better days. Replaces the High External Wooden Wall.

gates.external.high.stone.desc_short: A high stone gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.

gates.external.high.wood.desc_short: A high wooden gate, allowing access in and out of your compound.

ladder.wooden.wall.desc_short: A ladder will help you climb walls in any base.

legacy.shelter.wood.desc_short: The classic s*** shack. A great starter base for any fresh spawn. You can only have one shelter deployed at anytime.

wall.external.high.adobe.desc_short: A high stone wall used to keep people off your property.

wall.external.high.legacy.desc_short: A legacy themed wooden wall to keep the untamed wilderness away from your property, made with questionable carpentry. Replaces the High External Wooden Wall.

wall.external.high.stone.desc_short: A high stone wall used to keep people off your property.

wall.external.high.desc_short: A high wooden wall used to keep people off your property.

wall.frame.cell.gate.desc_short: A prison cell gate to lock things behind bars

wall.frame.garagedoor.desc_short: A garage door that rolls up and down.

wall.frame.shopfront.desc_short: A shop front to do commerce.

wall.frame.shopfront.metal.desc_short: A bulletproof shop front for secure trades.

wall.window.bars.metal.desc_short: Metal window bars made to fit a normal sized window.

wall.window.bars.toptier.desc_short: Window bars to fit a standard window. These bars are made out of reinforced metal and contain a thick surround to protect from incoming projectiles.

wall.window.bars.wood.desc_short: Window bars made out of wood. They'll stop people climbing through your window, but probably not for very long.

shutter.metal.embrasure.a.desc_short: Static shutter that forms a metal horizontal embrasure over your window frame.

shutter.metal.embrasure.b.desc_short: Static shutter that forms a metal vertical embrasure over your window frame.

shutter.wood.a.desc_short: Wood shutters that you can open and close.

watchtower.wood.desc_short: A high wooden watchtower with a ladder

cocoknight.armor.gloves.desc_short: Hand protection made of bark and plants, offers some protection to the upper body.

cocoknight.armor.helmet.desc_short: A shoddy helmet made from coconut, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.

cocoknight.armor.pants.desc_short: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from coconut and plants, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.

cocoknight.armor.torso.desc_short: A shoddy piece of body armor made from coconut and plants, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.

diving.fins.desc_short: Diving Fins. Significantly boosts your speed underwater but greatly reduces mobility on land.

diving.mask.desc_short: A diving mask that provides clear vision under water at the cost of reduced peripheral vision.

diving.tank.desc_short: An oxygen tank that enables breathing under water for a period of time. Can be refilled at a workbench.

diving.wetsuit.desc_short: A Wetsuit providing protection from frigid waters.

boots.frog.desc_short: Thank you for playing the game through its early access run. Enjoy these boots made from radiation resistant frog rubber.

barrelcostume.desc_short: A stupid barrel costume, so you can hide like a pro..p

cratecostume.desc_short: A sneaky crate costume. Use with a friend to expertly troll other players

burlap.gloves.new.desc_short: Basic burlap gloves, offering protection from the elements

burlap.gloves.desc_short: Gloves made out of leather, offers a small amount of protection to the upper body.

roadsign.gloves.desc_short: Gloves made out of metal, offer a good amount of protection to the upper body.

tactical.gloves.desc_short: Military issue tactical gloves provide protection as well as weapon stabilization leading to higher accuracy when used.

woodarmor.gloves.desc_short: Gloves made out of wood and leather, offers some protection to the upper body.

draculacape.desc_short: A robustly thick outer garment providing ample protection to the wearer.

draculamask.desc_short: A classic halloween costume mask which provides decent protection.

frankensteinmask.desc_short: Frankenstein halloween costume mask which provides decent protection.

ghostsheet.desc_short: Definitely not a last minute costume idea.

mummymask.desc_short: A classic halloween costume mask which provides decent protection.

metal.facemask.hockey.desc_short: A protective facemask which provides the user with excellent head protection from all forms of attacks.

attire.hide.helterneck.desc_short: A Halterneck made from the hide of an animal.

hat.beenie.desc_short: A wooly hat, offering some basic protection from damage and cold for your head.

hat.boonie.desc_short: A boonie hat, offering minor protection from damage and cold for your head.

bucket.helmet.desc_short: A Bucket Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.

burlap.headwrap.desc_short: A Headwrap made out of burlap.

hat.candle.desc_short: A hat with a candle on top. You can turn the candle on in your inventory.

hat.cap.desc_short: Simple hat for your head. Offers basic protection from damage and the cold.

clatter.helmet.desc_short: Special helmet for players who own Clatter and have played for at least 30 minutes, replaces the bucket helmet.

coffeecan.helmet.desc_short: A Coffee Can Helmet. It provides a level of regional protection from inflicted damage.

deer.skull.mask.desc_short: A primitive helmet made from bone. Moderate protection from projectiles and melee damage.

heavy.plate.helmet.desc_short: Offers superior protection at the cost of reduced vision and movement speed.

knightsarmour.helmet.desc_short: A medieval knights helmet. Made from scrap metal. Excellent craftmanship.

hat.miner.desc_short: A leather cap with a flashlight attached. It uses Low Grade Fuel and can be activated from the inventory.

partyhat.desc_short: A very stupid looking party hat

prisonerhood.desc_short: A hood for prisoners, restricts vision.

riot.helmet.desc_short: A makeshift riot Helmet. Great at deflecting melee attacks.

hat.wellipets.desc_short: A hat made of wellipets boots

wood.armor.helmet.desc_short: A shoddy helmet made from simple materials, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.

bone.armor.suit.desc_short: A primitive suit of armor made of bones, weak protection from damage and the elements but better than nothing.

heavy.plate.jacket.desc_short: Offers superior protection at the cost of aiming down sights and reduced movement speed.

jacket.snow.desc_short: A thick, high visibility Jacket. It will help keep you warm in any climate.

jacket.desc_short: A rugged jacket, will help keep you warm. High cold protection but incompatible with other chest attire.

wood.armor.jacket.desc_short: A shoddy piece of body armor made from simple materials, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.

lumberjack hoodie.desc_short: A lumberjack themed hoodie, earned by helping the Lumberjack. Offers the same protection as the standard hoodie.

mask.balaclava.desc_short: A makeshift balaclava. Cost effective protection from the cold, but unremarkable at preventing melee and projectile damage.

mask.bandana.desc_short: A square of cloth which is tied around the face over the nose and mouth.

metal.facemask.desc_short: A protective facemask which provides the user with excellent head protection from all forms of attacks.

metal.facemask.icemask.desc_short: A protective facemask which provides the user with excellent head protection from all forms of attacks.

minigunammopack.desc_short: A backpack designed to store ammunition for a minigun.

nightvisiongoggles.desc_short: Enables vision at nighttime by projecting and amplifying infrared light.The batteries can be recharged at a Lvl 2 workbench. Cannot be worn with a helmet.

heavy.plate.pants.desc_short: Offers superior protection at the cost of reduced movement speed.

attire.hide.pants.desc_short: Trousers made from the hide of an animal. Moderate protection against animal attacks.

knightsarmour.skirt.desc_short: A well made set of knights plate that covers the hips and thighs. Made of scrap metal.

roadsign.kilt.desc_short: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from roadsigns. Moderate protection from melee and projectiles.

pants.shorts.desc_short: Trusty pair of shorts, may provide a breeze in undesired places. Worse than their full length counterparts with only basic protection from damage and the elements.

wood.armor.pants.desc_short: A shoddy piece of leg armor made from simple materials, provides some basic protection from melee and ranged attacks.

pants.desc_short: A pair of pants, highly capable undergarment for your legs. Great all round protection from damage and the elements.

attire.hide.poncho.desc_short: Primitive armour for the chest made from animal skin. One size fits all. Offers some basic protection from damage and the elements.

burlap.shirt.desc_short: A Shirt made out of burlap.

shirt.collared.desc_short: A smart casual shirt. Might make you look more trustworthy. Moderate clothing for protection against damage and the elements.

attire.hide.vest.desc_short: Simple hide vest, made with common materials. Basic all-round protection.

shirt.tanktop.desc_short: A tank top, comes with free stains. Basic protection, but better than nothing.

shoes.boots.desc_short: Sturdy work boots to keep your toes safe, you'd feel nothing if you kicked a table leg. Strong protection against the cold and incoming damage.

attire.hide.boots.desc_short: Simple hide boots, made with common materials. Basic all-round protection.

attire.hide.skirt.desc_short: Simple hide skirt, made with common materials. Basic all-round protection.

hazmatsuit.arcticsuit.desc_short: An arctic variant of the hazmat suit which trades radiation for cold protection.

hazmatsuit.diver.desc_short: A divers suit found in the abyss, doubles as a reliable hazmat suit

hazmatsuit.desc_short: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

hazmatsuit.pilot.desc_short: A hazmat suit made from a fighter pilot's flight suit.

hazmatsuit_scientist.desc_short: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

hazmatsuit_scientist_arctic.desc_short: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

hazmatsuit_scientist_nvgm.desc_short: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

hazmatsuit_scientist_peacekeeper.desc_short: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

hazmatsuit.spacesuit.desc_short: A spacesuit built for harsh conditions.

hazmatsuittwitch.desc_short: A purple hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

scientistsuit_heavy.desc_short: A heavy hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

jumpsuit.waterwellnpc.desc_short: A green jumpsuit and gasmask worn by the waterwell NPC

tshirt.long.desc_short: Long sleeve tshirt, versatile clothing for protection against damage and the elements.

tshirt.desc_short: A tshirt, simple undergarment. Good protection from damage and the elements.

knighttorso.armour.desc_short: A well made collection of scrap metal formed into a knights armour.

metal.plate.torso.desc_short: A metal plate covering your torso, provides excellent protection from all forms of attacks.

metal.plate.torso.icevest.desc_short: A metal plate covering your torso, provides excellent protection from all forms of attacks.

roadsign.jacket.desc_short: A shoddy piece of body armor made from roadsigns.

clothing.mod.armorinsert_asbestos.desc_short: Asbestos insert providing extra protection from heat for crafted clothes and armor.

clothing.mod.armorinsert_lead.desc_short: Lead insert that adds radiation protection for crafted clothes and armor.

clothing.mod.armorinsert_metal.desc_short: Metal insert for crafted clothing and armor, provides extra protection from projectiles.

clothing.mod.armorinsert_wood.desc_short: Wood insert for crafted clothes and armor, provides some extra protection from bullets and melee.

bleach.desc_short: A powerful oxidizing agent. Can be used as a disinfectant.

ducttape.desc_short: A versatile adhesive tape reinforced with cloth.

carburetor1.desc_short: A low quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

carburetor2.desc_short: A medium quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

carburetor3.desc_short: A high quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

crankshaft1.desc_short: A low quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

crankshaft2.desc_short: A medium quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

crankshaft3.desc_short: A high quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

piston1.desc_short: Low quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

piston2.desc_short: Medium quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

piston3.desc_short: High quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

sparkplug1.desc_short: Low quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

sparkplug2.desc_short: Medium quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

sparkplug3.desc_short: High quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

valve1.desc_short: Low quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

valve2.desc_short: Medium quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

valve3.desc_short: High quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

fuse.desc_short: An unreliable electric fuse. Will allow electrical passthrough for a period of time.

gears.desc_short: A selection of gears. Some functional, some not.

metalblade.desc_short: A Metal Blade for making melee weapons.

roadsigns.desc_short: Some road signs made of metal.

sewingkit.desc_short: A Sewing kit. Used to make advanced clothing.

metalspring.desc_short: A metal spring. Used to provide motion or resistance in objects.

techparts.desc_short: A collection of random tech parts.

riflebody.desc_short: The firing mechanism of a rifle. Used in construction of a weapon that can fire 5.56 ammo fully automatic.

semibody.desc_short: The firing mechanism of a semi automatic weapon.

smgbody.desc_short: The firing mechanism of a submachinegun. Used in construction of a weapon that can fire pistol ammo fully automatic.

barricade.concrete.desc_short: A barricade made out of Stones.

barricade.wood.cover.desc_short: Perfect for cover when engaging in gun fights. Decays rapidly when placed outside of building privilege.

barricade.medieval.desc_short: A medieval barricade. Designed to block paths and provide defensive cover as well as being an effective tool to fortify your base.

barricade.metal.desc_short: A tough metal barricade with barbed wire, made from Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.

barricade.sandbags.desc_short: A protective barricade made out of Sand Bags.

barricade.stone.desc_short: A protective barricade made out of Stones.

barricade.wood.desc_short: A wooden barricade. Will hurt players and animals that run into it.

barricade.woodwire.desc_short: A wooden barricade with barbed wire, made of Wood and Metal Fragments. The barbed wire causes damage and will also slow player movement.

bbq.desc_short: A makeshift Barbeque. You can cook significant amounts of food with this.

trap.bear.desc_short: A metal trap that can injure or even kill people when stepped on. Can be picked up after been triggered.

bed.desc_short: A Bed. Placing this will give you a place to respawn and can be used much more frequently than a sleeping bag. Note: Must be placed inside a building.

beehive.desc_short: Hand made beehive, place a nucleus inside to raise your own bees and produce honeycomb. Happy bees will make honeycomb more quickly.

campfire.desc_short: A small camp fire. Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.

cardtable.desc_short: A table for playing card games

ceilinglight.desc_short: A small ceiling mounted light source.

chair.desc_short: Every home needs a chair. A decorative item which provides comfort while seated.

chair.icethrone.desc_short: Every home needs a chair. A decorative item which provides comfort while seated.

beanbagseatfabric.desc_short: A cozy fabric beanbag seat to sink in to.

beanbagseatleather.desc_short: A cozy leather beanbag seat to sink in to.

chair.ejector.seat.desc_short: A chair made from an ejector seat. A decorative item which provides comfort while seated. Stays put.

chickencoop.desc_short: An enclosure to keep some chickens around. Chickens with plenty of food, water and sunlight produce more eggs.

computerstation.desc_short: A Computer station for remote control access

cookingworkbench.desc_short: Used to cook advanced recipes for food, fuel, ammunition and explosives.

drone.desc_short: A remote controlled drone operated from the Computer station with a limited range. Easily damaged from impacts.

dropbox.desc_short: This item can be deployed on walls so that players can input items from the exterior of the building for safe keeping. You can only access the submitted contents of the Drop Box from the rear.

elevator.desc_short: A powered elevator. Place another elevator above or below this to connect it. Requires power.

fireplace.stone.desc_short: A stone fireplace to heat your home. Must be placed indoors and against a wall.

firework.boomer.blue.desc_short: A very large mortar type firework with a blue starburst

firework.boomer.champagne.desc_short: A very large mortar type firework with an massive champagne colored explosion followed by smaller orange starbursts

firework.boomer.green.desc_short: A very large mortar type firework with a green starburst

firework.boomer.orange.desc_short: A very large mortar type firework with an orange starburst

firework.boomer.pattern.desc_short: A special boomer which allows you light up the night sky with a custom pattern that you draw. Multiple colors and altitude settings are available.

firework.boomer.red.desc_short: A very large mortar type firework with a red starburst

firework.boomer.violet.desc_short: A very large mortar type firework with a violet starburst

firework.romancandle.blue.desc_short: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Blue balls into the air

firework.romancandle.green.desc_short: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Green balls into the air

firework.romancandle.red.desc_short: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of red balls into the air

firework.romancandle.violet.desc_short: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Violet balls into the air

firework.volcano.desc_short: Emits a beautiful shower of white sparks

firework.volcano.red.desc_short: Emits a beautiful shower of red sparks

firework.volcano.violet.desc_short: Emits a beautiful shower of Violet sparks

spikes.floor.desc_short: A set of spikes that will slow down and hurt anyone that walks over them.

half.bamboo.shelves.desc_short: Half height salvaged bamboo shelves for stacking

frankensteintable.desc_short: Place a monsters head, torso and legs into the table to summon Frankensteins monster.

fridge.desc_short: A fridge you can store food into!

furnace.large.desc_short: Used to smelt large quantities of ore. Difficult to secure, must be placed on terrain.

furnace.desc_short: A Furnace. Use it to smelt mined ore.

hazmat.plushy.desc_short: A plushy of your favourite outfit made by the fabulous people at YouTooz.com

hitchtroughcombo.desc_short: A Hitching post and Trough. Dismounting your horses here will keep them healthy and fed as long as it is kept stocked with food.

hopper.desc_short: Will suck up any dropped items in it's radius while powered

hab.armor.desc_short: Armor for the Hot Air Balloon

iotable.desc_short: This allows you to craft and unlock electrical, water and industrial items

jackolantern.angry.desc_short: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

jackolantern.happy.desc_short: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

trap.landmine.desc_short: Homemade Landmine. If you stand on one, you can ask a friend to disarm it before it explodes.

lantern.desc_short: A Lantern. Place it where you need light, requires low grade fuel to work.

box.wooden.large.desc_short: Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 48 items.

abyss.barrel.horizontal.desc_short: Horizontal Abyss container taken from the depths of the ocean

abyss.barrel.vertical.desc_short: Vertical Abyss container taken from the depths of the ocean

wicker.barrel.desc_short: Keep your things in this wicker barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.

bamboo.barrel.desc_short: Keep your things in this bamboo barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.

medieval.box.wooden.large.desc_short: Keep your things in this medieval themed wooden storage box. Stores up to 48 items.

water.barrel.desc_short: A storage container for water. Can output 10ml of water a second via a hose.

locker.desc_short: A locker for keeping your clothes and armor safe!

wall.frame.lunar2025_a.desc_short: A Lunar New Year themed decorative wall divider with geometric inlay

wall.frame.lunar2025_b.desc_short: A Lunar New Year themed decorative wall divider with swirling inlay

wall.frame.lunar2025_c.desc_short: A Lunar New Year themed decorative wall divider with floral inlay

mailbox.desc_short: A Mailbox that accepts notes. Only you can access the mail due to a one way slit.

mannequin.desc_short: Displays a set of clothing, quickly remove items off your player onto the Mannequin. Goes by Manny.

modularcarlift.desc_short: This allows you to modify modular vehicles

mining.pumpjack.desc_short: Extracts oil from the ground. Use a Survey Charge to determine the amount of oil available for extraction in any given area.

small.oil.refinery.desc_short: A small refinery which can produce Low Grade Fuel from Crude Oil.

planter.large.desc_short: A large planter with enough room to plant 9 seeds.

planter.small.desc_short: A small planter with enough room to plant 3 seeds.

planter.triangle.desc_short: A triangle planter with enough room to plant 4 seeds.

electric.audioalarm.desc_short: A speaker which will emit a loud warning alarm when powered

smart.alarm.desc_short: Sends a notifications to your phone when powered on.

storage.monitor.desc_short: The Storage Monitor attaches to the Tool Cupboard and Large Storage Box to monitor the container contents. Output sends a pulse when the container is updated.

electric.battery.rechargable.large.desc_short: A Large Rechargeable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

electric.battery.rechargable.medium.desc_short: A Medium Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

electric.battery.rechargable.small.desc_short: A small rechargable battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

electric.counter.desc_short: A basic cathode ray tube screen combined with an incremental counter. Can display power received, or can count upwards and allow passthrough when a target is reached.

electric.hbhfsensor.desc_short: A Heartbeat, Breathing, Humidity and Footstep sensor. Passthrough is equal to the number of humans detected in a 10m radius

electric.laserdetector.desc_short: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is in the beam

electric.pressurepad.desc_short: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is standing on it

tincan.alarm.desc_short: A primitive perimeter alarm made from hanging tin cans. Clatters loudly when disturbed, alerting you to any trespassers. Simple but effective.

electric.digitalclock.desc_short: A digital clock that displays the server time and lets you set alarms to pass power through when ringing. Ideal for synchronizing traps or timed events.

electric.doorcontroller.desc_short: A Door Controller. Will manipulate the state of the closest door when it receives power

electric.furnace.desc_short: An electrical version of a furnace that uses electricity instead of a fuel source.

electric.heater.desc_short: Provides warmth in a radius when on

fluid.combiner.desc_short: Combines three separate fluid connections into one connection.

fluid.splitter.desc_short: Splits a fluid connection into three separate connections.

fluid.switch.desc_short: A simple switch that enables fluid to pass through. Can be switched on/off manually or via electricity. Can also pump water upwards to higher entities when powered.

electric.andswitch.desc_short: A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if BOTH inputs receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source

electric.blocker.desc_short: This object prevents passthrough while power is received through its second input.

electrical.branch.desc_short: This object allows you to branch power off from a main line by a set amount.

electrical.combiner.desc_short: This object combines two root electrical sources into a single signal. Helpful for stringing together low energy batteries or solar panels to produce higher power output. Can be wired in series, can not be used with any non energy producing electrical components.

electrical.memorycell.desc_short: A 1 bit storage component. SET input will set the value to 1 CLEAR input sets the value to 0. Output will provide connected power if value is 1, Inverted output will provide connected power if value is 0. This is also known as a D-Type Flip Flop

electric.orswitch.desc_short: A logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if EITHER input receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source

electric.random.switch.desc_short: This switch will allow passthrough based on a random number. Each time the SET input receives power it will roll true or false to allow passthrough

electric.xorswitch.desc_short: An exclusive-or logic gate that allows electrical passthrough if ONLY ONE input receives power, passthrough amount is whichever single input is active. If BOTH inputs recieve power, passthrough will be zero.

electric.fuelgenerator.small.desc_short: A small electric generator powered by Low Grade Fuel that outputs 40 power.

electric.generator.small.desc_short: A Mailbox that accepts notes. Only you can access the mail due to a one way slit.

electric.solarpanel.large.desc_short: A solar panel which converts sunlight into energy. The amount of energy generated is dependent on the sun's intensity and angle to the panel.

electric.igniter.desc_short: Ignites nearby objects such as furnaces and campfires when power is received

storageadaptor.desc_short: Attach to a storage container to allow industrial input/output connections.

industrial.combiner.desc_short: Combines three separate industrial connections into one connection.

industrial.conveyor.desc_short: Moves an item from one container to another.

industrial.crafter.desc_short: Attaches to a workbench to allow automated crafting.

industrial.splitter.desc_short: Splits an industrial connection into three separate connections.

electric.chandelier.desc_short: A large adjustable electric chandelier. Very fancy.

electric.tablelight.desc_short: A small light source made out of an old oil can.

electric.fairylights.desc_short: A wire of small fairy bulbs, can be deployed point by point to light up your base.

electric.fluorescentlight.desc_short: Bright enough to see what you’re doing.

electric.bulbstringlights.desc_short: A string of glowing bulbs, can be deployed point by point to light up your base.

electric.spotlight.desc_short: A spotlight you can orient with a hammer.

electric.spotlight.tripod.desc_short: A spotlight you can orient with a hammer.

powered.water.purifier.desc_short: A device that converts salt water to fresh water while powered.

electric.seismicsensor.desc_short: A small device that detects vibrations within a set range. Will output a different power value depending on the explosive type detected, ideal to know when your time has come.

electric.splitter.desc_short: Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.

electric.sprinkler.desc_short: A small sprinkler that sprays water around it. Requires a hose connection to supply it with water.

electric.teslacoil.desc_short: An electrical trap that zaps nearby players when powered. More power supplied will result in higher damage. Loses durability with use.

electric.timer.desc_short: A Timer switch, will pass power through for duration.

electric.cabletunnel.desc_short: Allows you to pass a cable through a wall. Each input will forward the amount it receives to the corresponding output on the other side.

waterpump.desc_short: Can be placed in a water source to collect that water while powered. Can be connected to other Water entities.

ptz.cctv.camera.desc_short: A CCTV Camera system can be used for realtime surveillance and security when paired with the Computer Station. This camera has pan, tilt, and zoom capability.

mining.quarry.desc_short: Extracts minerals from the ground. Use a Survey Charge to determine the amount of minerals available for extraction in any given area.

target.reactive.desc_short: A reactive target that knocks down when hit, can be reset.

box.repair.bench.desc_short: You can repair your items here for a fraction of their construction cost. You may also use this to apply new skins to existing items.

research.table.desc_short: You can use this table to learn how to permanently craft items you have found in exchange for scrap.

rug.bear.desc_short: A decorative rug that can be placed on walls, floors, and ceilings. Provides comfort when in close proximity.

rug.desc_short: A decorative rug that can be placed on walls, floors, and ceilings. Provides comfort when in close proximity.

sculpture.ice.desc_short: An block of ice you can sculpt.

searchlight.desc_short: A Large, wide beam, aimable light source.

secretlabchair.desc_short: A luxurious, comfortable chair for long sessions of CCTV watching.

sign.hanging.banner.large.desc_short: A large banner hanging on a wall.

sign.hanging.desc_short: A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings.

sign.hanging.ornate.desc_short: A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings.

sign.pictureframe.landscape.desc_short: A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings.

sign.pictureframe.portrait.desc_short: A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings.

sign.pictureframe.tall.desc_short: A tall canvas for artists paintings.

sign.pictureframe.xl.desc_short: An extra large canvas for artists paintings.

sign.pictureframe.xxl.desc_short: A double extra large canvas for artists paintings.

sign.pole.banner.large.desc_short: A large banner hanging on a pole.

sign.post.double.desc_short: A double sign post that you can plant into terrain.

sign.post.single.desc_short: A single sign post that you can plant into terrain.

sign.post.town.desc_short: A one sided town sign post, that you can plant into terrain.

sign.post.town.roof.desc_short: A double sided town sign post, with roof, that you can plant into terrain.

sign.wooden.huge.desc_short: A 6-meter by 3-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

sign.wooden.large.desc_short: A 3-meter by 1.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

sign.wooden.medium.desc_short: A 2-meter by 1-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

sign.wooden.small.desc_short: A 1-meter by 0.5-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

guntrap.desc_short: A shotgun trap triggered by movement, place near doorways and load with handmade shells.

sleepingbag.desc_short: A sleeping bag. Placing this will give you or an assigned player a place to respawn, with a long cooldown.

stash.small.desc_short: A hidden, burried stash to keep your items safe. After placing, return to the stash and aim at the ground where you hid it and it will reveal itself.

sofa.desc_short: A comfortable old sofa. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.

sofa.pattern.desc_short: A comfortable old sofa with a floral pattern. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.

fishtrap.small.desc_short: Traps fish, place on the shore and load with bait. The more bait loaded the bigger the chance of catching Trout.

table.desc_short: Every home needs a table. A decorative item which provides comfort when in close proximity.

workbench1.desc_short: This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 1

workbench2.desc_short: This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 2

workbench3.desc_short: This allows you to craft and unlock items requiring workbench level 3

cupboard.tool.desc_short: Placing and authorising with the cupboard will make it so only you can build in a 50 meter radius of it. If you want your friends to build, they'll need to auth too. You should protect this.

cupboard.tool.retro.desc_short: Transform your tool cupboard experience with this modified Hi-Fi cabinet. Complete with retro displays indicating vital base data as well as frosted glass doors allowing you to view its contents of tools and resources!

cupboard.tool.shockbyte.desc_short: Ensure 100% Tool Cupboard uptime with this Tool Cupboard skin.

tunalight.desc_short: A makeshift wall light. Still smells faintly of fish.

vending.machine.desc_short:
Trade your goods with other players safely by creating sell and buy orders.  

If a raider gains access to the rear panel, they will have free reign over all of your goodies. Keep it safe.

electric.wallcabinet.desc_short: A cabinet with a shelf for small items.

water.catcher.large.desc_short: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.

water.catcher.small.desc_short: Collects drinkable water from the air via rain and dew. Can be connected to other entities to provide water, 20ml a second.

water.purifier.desc_short: A Water Purifier. Place overtop of a campfire. Will provide clean, drinkable water from salty, or stagnant water.

gunrack.horizontal.desc_short: Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.

gunrack.single.1.horizontal.desc_short: Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.

gunrack.single.2.horizontal.desc_short: Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.

gunrack.single.3.horizontal.desc_short: Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.

gunrack_stand.desc_short: Holds weaponry haphazardly, a charmingly chaotic addition to your virtual armory.

gunrack_tall.horizontal.desc_short: Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.

gunrack_wide.horizontal.desc_short: Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.

generator.wind.scrap.desc_short: Converts kinetic energy harvested from the wind into electricity. Amount generated will vary depending on wind speed. Higher altitudes will yield stronger winds.

box.wooden.desc_short: Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 18 items.

pilot.hazmat.box.wooden.desc_short: Keep your things in this Black Box. Stores up to 18 items.

apple.desc_short: An Apple. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

apple.spoiled.desc_short: A rotten apple. Eating it currently provides a tiny boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

black.raspberries.desc_short: Black Raspberries picked from berry bushes. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

blueberries.desc_short: Blueberries picked from berry bushes. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

botabag.desc_short: A canteen used to carry Water. Left click to drink, right click to fill from water sources, or to pour out.

bread.loaf.desc_short: A loaf of bread, eating it provides a boost to health, hunger and hydration. Feeding to a horse will provide a boost to its digestion and dung production for a short time.

grub.desc_short: A pale, fleshy insect that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.

worm.desc_short: A small, writhing worm that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.

cactusflesh.desc_short: Flesh of a Cactus, contains water.

can.beans.desc_short: Beans found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

can.tuna.desc_short: Chunked tuna found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

chocolate.desc_short: Chocolate Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

egg.desc_short: An egg laid by a chicken, will hatch in a coop. Can be eaten raw but best saved for a recipe.

fish.anchovy.desc_short: A small bony fish commonly found in large schools.

fish.catfish.desc_short: A large, whiskered fresh water based predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

fish.herring.desc_short: A small fish commonly found in a variety of water sources.

fish.minnows.desc_short: A Small group of edible fish.

fish.orangeroughy.desc_short: A rare fish found in the depths of the ocean. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

fish.salmon.desc_short: A large Salmon, found in fresh and salt water. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

fish.sardine.desc_short: A small oily fish, commonly found in large schools.

fish.smallshark.desc_short: A small, surprisingly aggressive deep sea predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

fish.troutsmall.desc_short: A Small Trout. Good for a few meals.

fish.yellowperch.desc_short: A Yellow Perch, commonly found in freshwater rivers.

granolabar.desc_short: Granola Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger.

honey.desc_short: A jar of honey. Good for reducing hunger and radiation, or could be saved for recipes. The source of the glass jar is a mystery.

nucleus.desc_short: The heart of any hive, needed for raising bees. Produce honeycomb from happy bees to grow the nucleus and increase yields.

bearmeat.burned.desc_short: Bear Meat that has been overcooked.

bearmeat.cooked.desc_short: Delicious Bear Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

bearmeat.desc_short: Raw Bear Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

bearmeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Bear Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

bigcatmeat.cooked.desc_short: Delicious Big Cat Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

bigcatmeat.desc_short: Raw Big Cat Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

bigcatmeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Big Cat Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

chicken.burned.desc_short: Burned chicken. Eating it will damage your health.

chicken.cooked.desc_short: Cooked chicken. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

chicken.raw.desc_short: Raw chicken breast. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

chicken.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Chicken. Eating it will damage your health.

crocodilemeat.cooked.desc_short: Delicious Crocodile Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

crocodilemeat.desc_short: Raw Crocodile Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

crocodilemeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Crocodile Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

deermeat.burned.desc_short: Burned Deer Meat. Eating it will damage your health.

deermeat.cooked.desc_short: Cooked Deer Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

deermeat.raw.desc_short: Raw Deer Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

deermeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Deer Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

fish.cooked.desc_short: Cooked Fish. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

fish.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Fish Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

horsemeat.burned.desc_short: Burned horse meat. Eating it will damage your health.

horsemeat.cooked.desc_short: Cooked Horse Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

horsemeat.raw.desc_short: Raw Horse Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

horsemeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Horse Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

humanmeat.burned.desc_short: Burned Meat from a human being. Consuming will damage your health.

humanmeat.cooked.desc_short: Salty meat from a human being, eating this will restore some hunger and health but reduces hydration. Maybe you should look for a better food source.

humanmeat.raw.desc_short: Raw human meat. Consuming will damage your health.

humanmeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Human Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

meat.pork.burned.desc_short: This little piggy has been in the oven for too long.

meat.pork.cooked.desc_short: Cooked pork, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

meat.boar.desc_short: Raw pork. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

porkmeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Pork Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

snakemeat.cooked.desc_short: Delicious Snake Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

snakemeat.desc_short: Raw Snake Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

snakemeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Snake Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

wolfmeat.burned.desc_short: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

wolfmeat.cooked.desc_short: Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

wolfmeat.raw.desc_short: Raw Wolf Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

wolfmeat.spoiled.desc_short: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

mushroom.desc_short: A Mushroom found on the ground. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

jar.pickle.desc_short: Cucumbers in a vinegar bath, jarred by an amateur. Eat at your own risk.

pie.apple.desc_short: A delicious apple pie, always too hot. Provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Gives better night vision, including tree markings and ore hotspots, for a short time.

pie.bear.desc_short: A pie made of bear meat, provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Increases effect of harvesting teas but reduces their duration.

pie.bigcat.desc_short: A pie made from jungle cat meat, purrfect temperature. Boosts hunger, health and hydration. Shows nearby animal tracks for a short time.

pie.chicken.desc_short: Just like mom used to make. Provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Increases the chance of better genes from crops for short time.

pie.crocodile.desc_short: A pie made from crocodile meat, may cause a reptile dysfunction. Boosts hunger, health and hydration. Gives better night vision, including tree markings and ore hotspots, for a short time.

pie.fish.desc_short: Delightful fish pie. Provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Increases base comfort level for a short time.

pie.hunters.desc_short: Tasty hunters pie, made with real deer. Provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Reduces bleeding for a short time.

pie.pork.desc_short: Tempting pork pie, provides a boost to hunger, health and hydration. Improves healing rate from other sources for a short time.

pie.pumpkin.desc_short: Spooky pumpkin pie, provides a boost to health, hunger and hydration. Increases maximum health for a short time.

pie.survivors.desc_short: It's people. Survivor's pie is made out of people. Provides a boost to health, hunger and hydration. Increases yield when harvesting corpses for a short time.

smallwaterbottle.desc_short: A Small Water Bottle. Left click to drink, right click to fill from water sources, or to pour out.

spoiled.produce.desc_short: A spoiled fruit or vegetable. It's so far gone it's hard to tell what it originally was.

waterjug.desc_short: A large jerry can for all kinds of water. Holds up to 5000ml. Careful not to throw it all away!

fun.bass.desc_short: Use this stringed together shovel to play some deep, deep tunes.

fun.cowbell.desc_short: A road sign that's been repurposed to produce some beautiful, calming, percussion.

drumkit.desc_short: An array of pots, pans and buckets that passes as a serviceable Drum Kit. Three cymbals, some Tom Drums and a Kick Drum means you can easily lay down a beat.

fun.flute.desc_short: A set of repurposed PVC pipes that can be used to play a variety of melodies.

fun.guitar.desc_short: A classic acoustic guitar, built for jam sessions around campfires at night.

fun.jerrycanguitar.desc_short: Take advantage of the unique acoustics of the Jerry Can Guitar to play some rustic tunes.

piano.desc_short: The Piano is a repurposed wheelbarrow that weighs a ton, but makes up for it with a wide range of notes.

fun.tambourine.desc_short: A selection of crumpled cans assembled into a ring to produce some great background percussion.

fun.trumpet.desc_short: Toot your own horn with this brassy improvised Trumpet.

fun.tuba.desc_short: A collection of used piping that’s been converted into a Tuba. Probably not very hygienic.

xylophone.desc_short: A selection of bones that were “acquired” for their acoustic attributes. Play a lullaby for your camp with these soothing tones.

door.key.desc_short: A key to a door, created from a Lock. Keep this item safe; if lost you'll be unable to open the door again!

lock.key.desc_short: Place on a door to prevent unwelcome guests. You can create a key to share with your friends, don't let it fall in the wrong hands!

lock.code.desc_short: An electronic lock. Locked and unlocked with four-digit code.

lock.code.a.pilot.desc_short: An electronic lock made of airplane parts. Locked and unlocked with four-digit code.

hat.dragonmask.desc_short: A special dragon mask to celebrate Chinese New Year

newyeargong.desc_short: Ring in the Lunar new year with a massive gong!

hat.oxmask.desc_short: An Ox mask to celebrate the 2021 Lunar New Year.

hat.rabbitmask.desc_short: A Beautifully crafted Rabbit mask to celebrate the 2023 Lunar New Year

hat.ratmask.desc_short: A Beautifully crafted bronze and gold Rat mask to celebrate the 2020 Lunar New Year

skylantern.desc_short: A beautiful sky lantern. Can be launched in any direction. Has one inventory slot. Can be Ignited with a lit torch.

hat.snakemask.desc_short: A Beautifully crafted Snake mask to celebrate the 2025 Lunar New Year

hat.tigermask.desc_short: A special tiger mask to celebrate Chinese New Year

confetticannon.desc_short: Blast a cloud of birthday themed confetti cheer.

door.double.hinged.bardoors.desc_short:
A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.

bathtub.planter.desc_short: A small planter with enough room to plant 3 seeds.

head.bag.desc_short: A sack containing the head of a defeated foe. Can be added to trophies.

fishtrophy.desc_short: A wall mountable item to show off your greatest catches. Fish not included.

huntingtrophylarge.desc_short: A large trophy stand to mount the head of killed animals or enemies.

huntingtrophysmall.desc_short: A trophy stand to mount the head of killed animals or enemies.

minecart.planter.desc_short: A small planter with enough room to plant 2 seeds.

rail.road.planter.desc_short: A large planter with enough room to plant 9 seeds.

triangle.rail.road.planter.desc_short: A triangle planter with enough room to plant 4 seeds.

rockingchair.desc_short: A rocking chair that responds to your input. Don't fire whilst seated.

rockingchair.rockingchair2.desc_short: A rocking chair that responds to your input. Don't fire whilst seated.

rockingchair.rockingchair3.desc_short: A rocking chair that responds to your input. Don't fire whilst seated.

knife.skinning.desc_short: A sharp skinning knife. Extremely good at harvesting flesh and can produce trophies that can be mounted on Hunting Trophies.

storage_barrel_a.desc_short: Keep your things in this wooden storage box. Stores up to 48 items.

storage_barrel_b.desc_short: Keep your things in this wooden barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.

storage_barrel_c.desc_short: Keep your things in this wooden barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.

torchholder.desc_short: A wall mounted holder for torches.

wantedposter.wantedposter2.desc_short: A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.

wantedposter.wantedposter3.desc_short: A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.

wantedposter.wantedposter4.desc_short: A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.

wantedposter.desc_short: A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.

door.closer.desc_short: Automatically closes your doors when left open.

attire.bunnyears.desc_short: Bunny Ears. Grants additional Egg Vision allowing you to detect more eggs during an Easter egg hunt.

attire.bunny.onesie.desc_short: A Bunny Onesie. Grants additional Egg Vision allowing you to detect more eggs during an Easter egg hunt.

hat.bunnyhat.desc_short: A silly Bunny Hat with wobbly ears to celebrate Easter 2021

chicken.costume.desc_short: An inflatable chicken costume. Acting as a replacement for wooden pants, you can equip this item to look as silly as possible.

easterdoorwreath.desc_short: A beautiful, hand crafted Easter themed door wreath.

easterbasket.desc_short: An easter egg basket. Equip to pick up eggs during an easter egg hunt with left click. Use right click to throw

attire.egg.suit.desc_short: An eggsquisite egg costume, can be painted when unequipped.

rustige_egg_a.desc_short: An exquisite hand crafted gold and diamond egg. When opened, a very special melody can be heard as you observe an intricate representation of your favorite monument.

rustige_egg_b.desc_short: A beautiful hand crafted white gold and sapphire encrusted egg, with a miniature monument contained inside.

rustige_egg_c.desc_short: A beautiful hand crafted purple egg with gold lace, a miniature offshore monument is contained inside.

rustige_egg_d.desc_short: A beautiful hand crafted Ivory and gold egg, with a miniature monument contained inside.

rustige_egg_e.desc_short: A beautiful hand crafted gold and green egg, with a miniature traincart contained inside.

rustige_egg_f.desc_short: A beautiful hand crafted gold and white egg, with a miniature underwater lab scene contained inside.

rustige_egg_g.desc_short: A beautiful hand crafted cerulean and gold egg, with a miniature cargo ship scene contained inside.

horse.costume.desc_short: An inflatable horse costume. Acting as a replacement for wooden pants, you can equip this item to look as silly as possible.

attire.nesthat.desc_short: An extremely silly easter nest hat with googly eyes.

easter.bronzeegg.desc_short: A Bronze Egg. Open for a surprise or collect 10 to upgrade to a silver egg.

easter.goldegg.desc_short: A Gold Egg. Containing the best easter loot.

easter.paintedeggs.desc_short: Some simple painted eggs. Collect 10 to upgrade to a bronze egg

easter.silveregg.desc_short: A Silver Egg. Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a gold Egg

halloween.candy.desc_short: Some loose halloween candy Collect 10 to upgrade to a Small Loot Bag!

carvable.pumpkin.desc_short:
A pumpkin that you can carve. 

Requires wood as a fuel source.

cursedcauldron.desc_short: A spooky cast iron cauldron with a green goo.

gravestone.desc_short: A Gravestone marking the remains of an unknown soul

woodcross.desc_short: A wooden cross marking the remains of an unknown soul

A balanced set of legs.

frankensteins.monster.02.torso.desc_short:
A balanced torso.
