halloween.lootbag.large.desc_short: A massive haul. Contains the best halloween loot

halloween.lootbag.medium.desc_short: Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a Large loot bag, containing the best loot

halloween.lootbag.small.desc_short: Open for a surprise, or collect 10 to upgrade to a medium loot bag containing better loot!

pumpkinbasket.desc_short: A pumpkin basket to help you collect candy much faster during Trick or Treat events with left click. Use right click to throw candy

scarecrow.desc_short: Get into the halloween spirit with this decorative deployable item.

skullspikes.candles.desc_short: A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.

skullspikes.pumpkin.desc_short: A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.

skullspikes.desc_short: A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.

skull_fire_pit.desc_short: Enjoy burning your enemies remnants to ashes with this Halloween exclusive! Provides warmth and light, and you can cook with it.

spiderweb.desc_short: Giant Cobwebs which can be hung against both a ceiling and a wall.

spookyspeaker.desc_short: Frighten your guests with creepy and spooky halloween sounds!

skull.trophy.jar.desc_short: A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.

skull.trophy.jar2.desc_short: A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.

skull.trophy.table.desc_short: A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.

skull.trophy.desc_short: A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.

largebackpack.desc_short: A larger military backpack that can hold items inside it

medieval.door.double.hinged.metal.desc_short: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.

medieval.door.hinged.metal.desc_short: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.

frontiermirror.large.desc_short: A large wooden frontier themed mirror

frontiermirror.medium.desc_short: A medium wood frontier themed mirror

frontiermirror.small.desc_short: A small wooden frontier themed mirror

frontiermirror.standing.desc_short: A standing wooden frontier themed mirror

woodmirror.standing.desc_short: A standing wooden frontier themed mirror

note.desc_short: A scrap of paper for leaving notes.

parachute.desc_short: Once equipped, press [+jump] while in mid-air to pull the cord. Must be repacked after use. Must be at least 15m above the ground in order to deploy.

factorydoor.desc_short: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives. Contains a bulletproof viewing portal

abovegroundpool.desc_short: A large wooden pool that can be filled with water.

beachchair.desc_short: The Beach Chair is the best way to relax, whether it's by the pool or on the beach.

beachparasol.desc_short: A large umbrella that will shield you from the sun.

beachtable.desc_short: A small table to hold your drinks while relaxing.

beachtowel.desc_short: A colourful beach towel. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.

boogieboard.desc_short: Use the boogie board to catch some sick waves.

innertube.desc_short: An inflated tube for aquatic activities.

innertube.horse.desc_short: An inflated tube for aquatic activities.

innertube.unicorn.desc_short: An inflated tube for aquatic activities.

tool.instant_camera.desc_short: An instant camera. Take photos with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and change focus mode with reload.

paddlingpool.desc_short: A small inflatable pool that you can fill up with water.

photo.desc_short: A photograph taken with an instant camera.

photoframe.landscape.desc_short: A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings.

photoframe.large.desc_short: A large frame for your photos.

photoframe.portrait.desc_short: A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings.

sunglasses02black.desc_short: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

sunglasses02camo.desc_short: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

sunglasses02red.desc_short: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

sunglasses03black.desc_short: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

sunglasses03chrome.desc_short: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

sunglasses03gold.desc_short: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

sunglasses.desc_short: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

gun.water.desc_short: A large water gun with pumpable pressure. Hold reload to pump!

pistol.water.desc_short: A small water gun that doesn't require pumping, but has a lower range and output.

trophy.desc_short: A trophy dedicated to the survivors of Rust Twitch Rivals

trophy2023.desc_short: A trophy dedicated to the survivors of Rust Twitch Rivals 2023

twitchsunglasses.desc_short: Sunglasses - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.

twitch.headset.desc_short: Every gamer needs a headset! - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.

hobobarrel.desc_short: A vagabond staple. Use this repurposed oil barrel to stay warm.

door.hinged.industrial.a.desc_short: Medium strength door, vulnerable to explosives.

twitchrivalsflag.desc_short: A wearable flag for Twitch Rivals

venom.snake.desc_short: The venom of a snake. Used to create Incapacitate darts.

xmas.advent.desc_short: Receive a special gift each and every day!

candycaneclub.desc_short: Smash some faces with this large piece of candy

xmas.lightstring.desc_short: A string of colored lights to decorate your home

xmas.door.garland.desc_short: A Festive decoration to spruce up your  doorway during the holdiays!

xmas.double.door.garland.desc_short: A Festive decoration to spruce up your double doorway during the holidays!

candycane.desc_short: A very old candy cane from 2014

giantcandycanedecor.desc_short: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative inflated giant candy cane

wall.ice.wall.desc_short: A short wall made of solid ice.

wall.external.high.ice.desc_short: A very high ice wall to protect your property.

giantlollipops.desc_short: Get into the holiday spirit with these decorative giant lollipops

pookie.bear.desc_short: A companion that reminds you of your youth.

xmas.lightstring.advanced.desc_short: Colored, animated, powered Lights that can be deployed point by point to light up your base.

xmas.present.large.desc_short: A Large Present, the best there is. Unwrap it now!

xmas.present.medium.desc_short: A medium present, might be good! Collect 5 to upgrade to a larger present.

xmas.present.small.desc_short: A small stocking stuffer present, Collect 10 to upgrade to a larger present.

sled.xmas.desc_short: A wooden sled to quickly travel down snowy hills.

sled.desc_short: A wooden sled to quickly travel down snowy hills.

snowmachine.desc_short: A machine which will blanket the surrounding terrain in snow.

snowballgun.desc_short: Load snowballs and lay waste to your foes with Christmas cheer.

snowman.desc_short: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative snowman

stocking.large.desc_short: A SUPER Stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get an awesome gift!

stocking.small.desc_short: A small stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get a gift! Collect 6 to upgrade to a SUPER Stocking.

gingerbreadsuit.desc_short: A suit made of gingerbread, slightly crunchy.

attire.reindeer.headband.desc_short: A festive reindeer antlers headband and nose.

santabeard.desc_short: A santa beard. Ho Ho ho.

santahat.desc_short: A santa hat. Ho Ho ho.

attire.snowman.helmet.desc_short: A snowman helmet which provides ample protection.

xmas.window.garland.desc_short: A Festive decoration to spruce up your windows during the holdiays!

wrappingpaper.desc_short: Use this to conceal any item in a lazily wrapped gift

xmasdoorwreath.desc_short: Get into the christmas spirit with this holiday door wreath.

xmas.decoration.baubels.desc_short: Decorative Baubels you can hang on your Christmas tree

xmas.decoration.candycanes.desc_short: Decorative Plastic Candy Canes you can hang on your Christmas tree

xmas.decoration.gingerbreadmen.desc_short: Decorative Gingerbread Men you can hang on your Christmas tree

xmas.decoration.lights.desc_short: A tree isn't complete without colorful lights!

xmas.decoration.pinecone.desc_short: Decorative Pinecones you can hang on your Christmas tree

xmas.decoration.star.desc_short: A golden star to top off your Christmas Tree

xmas.decoration.tinsel.desc_short: Decorative Tinsel you can hang on your Christmas tree

xmas.tree.desc_short: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative Christmas tree

captainslog.desc_short: A deteriorating piece of paper with information relating to the last moments of this vessel.

documents.desc_short: A stack of technical looking documents.

autoturret.desc_short: This automated electric sentry turret will engage and neutralize any moving targets it has line of sight to. You must equip it with a projectile weapon and the corresponding ammunition. Note : The turret will search for targets in a 180 degree arc facing *you* when you place it. Requires 10 power.

flameturret.desc_short: Automated Flame turret. Requires Low Grade Fuel. Sprays flames when triggered.

ammo.rocket.sam.desc_short: Ammunition for a SAM Site. This missile contains a rudimentary guidance system to help it navigate through strong winds.

samsite.desc_short: A surface to air rocket site. Requires 25 electricity to function.

clone.black.berry.desc_short: A clipping of a Black Berry Plant.

seed.black.berry.desc_short:
These black berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.

blue.berry.desc_short: A blue berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.blue.berry.desc_short: A clipping of a Blue Berry Plant.

seed.blue.berry.desc_short:
These blue berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.

green.berry.desc_short: A green berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.green.berry.desc_short: A clipping of a Green Berry Plant.

seed.green.berry.desc_short:
These green berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

red.berry.desc_short: A red berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.red.berry.desc_short: A clipping of a Red Berry Plant.

seed.red.berry.desc_short:
These red berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.

white.berry.desc_short: A white berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.white.berry.desc_short: A clipping of a White Berry Plant.

seed.white.berry.desc_short:
These white berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.

yellow.berry.desc_short: A yellow berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

clone.yellow.berry.desc_short: A clipping of a Yellow Berry Plant.

seed.yellow.berry.desc_short:
These yellow berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more berries and faster growth.

corn.desc_short: An ear of corn. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

clone.corn.desc_short: A Clipping of a Corn Plant.

seed.corn.desc_short:
Corn seeds can be found when picking wild Corn plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more corn and faster growth.

clone.hemp.desc_short: A clipping of a hemp plant.

seed.hemp.desc_short:
Hemp seeds can be found when picking wild Hemp. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional cloth.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more cloth and faster growth.

clone.orchid.desc_short: A clipping of an orchid plant.

seed.orchid.desc_short: Orchid seeds can be found when picking wild Orchids.

clone.potato.desc_short: A Clipping of a Potato Plant.

seed.potato.desc_short:
These potato seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more potatoes and faster growth.

pumpkin.desc_short: An edible vegetable that can also be worn as a hat. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

clone.pumpkin.desc_short: A Clipping of a pumpkin plant.

seed.pumpkin.desc_short:
Pumpkin Seeds can be found when picking wild Pumpkin plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more pumpkins and faster growth.

clone.rose.desc_short: A clipping of a rose plant.

seed.rose.desc_short: Rose seeds can be found when picking wild Roses.

clone.sunflower.desc_short: A clipping of a sunflower plant.

seed.sunflower.desc_short: Sunflower seeds can be found when picking wild Sunflowers.

wheat.desc_short: A bundle of wheat. Edible, but better off in a cooking recipe.

clone.wheat.desc_short: A Clipping of a Wheat Plant.

seed.wheat.desc_short: Wheat seeds, found when eating wheat or harvesting wild crops. Plant in the ground or a planter to grow more.  Seeds grown in good conditions will have higher yields and grow faster.

fat.animal.desc_short: Harvested from animals, combine with cloth to create a low quality fuel source.

bone.fragments.desc_short: Extracted from animal carcass.  Used as a raw material to make bone weapons and armour.

cctv.camera.desc_short: A CCTV Camera system can be used for realtime surveillance and security around your base when powered and paired with the Computer Station.

charcoal.desc_short: Byproduct from campfires and furnaces used for crafting gunpowder.

cloth.desc_short: Cloth from an animal or a Hemp Bush. Used in many clothing items, weapons, and more.

crude.oil.desc_short: Raw Oil out of the ground, must be refined in a refinery to be used.

diesel_barrel.desc_short: Suitable fuel to power quarries and the giant excavator.

can.beans.empty.desc_short: An empty Can of Beans. Can be smelted into Metal Fragments.

can.tuna.empty.desc_short: An empty Can of Tuna. Can be smelted into Metal Fragments.

explosives.desc_short: A component used for crafting C4 and Rockets.

fertilizer.desc_short: Helps plants grow by increasing ground condition. Produced in a composter.

gunpowder.desc_short: Made from Sulfur and Charcoal, a key ingredient of anything that goes bang!

honeycomb.desc_short: Building blocks of a hive, taken from a natural beehive. Can be cooked in a furnace to guarantee honey, or extracted for honey and a small chance of a nucleus.

hq.metal.ore.desc_short: A rock containing High Quality Metal. Can be smelted in a furnace.

metal.refined.desc_short: High quality metal suitable for armor and weapons construction.

leather.desc_short: Leather from an animal. Used in many clothing items and more.

lowgradefuel.desc_short: Low Grade Fuel, used to power light sources.

metal.fragments.desc_short: Metal Fragments. Smelted from Metal Ore, used in lots of different crafting recipes.

metal.ore.desc_short: A naturally occurring rock containing metal and metal compounds. You can extract this metal using a furnace.

paper.desc_short: Paper, a ingredient for Building plan and Note.

plantfiber.desc_short: Fiber from dead plants. Can be composted.

water.radioactive.desc_short: Glowing water. Consuming will damage your health and irradiate you.

researchpaper.desc_short: Use this item in a Research Bench to create blueprints of items.

water.salt.desc_short: Water with a high salt content. Consuming will damage your health.

scrap.desc_short: Scrap can be used in a Research table and Workbench to unlock and research items. Often used as a currency throughout the world.

stones.desc_short: Harvested from rocks using tools, basic building material.

sulfur.ore.desc_short: A rock containing sulfur. The sulfur can be extracted using a furnace.

sulfur.desc_short: Sulfur is commonly used in gunpowder, medicine, and matches. Matches release sulfur dioxide when they burn, giving them their smell. Sulfur is an essential component to living cells. Many proteins contain sulfur. It is also used as a pesticide on organic farms.

targeting.computer.desc_short: A computer loaded with software that can analyze a video and produce rotational deltas to individual objects contained in the feed.

water.desc_short: Water. Drinking it will alleviate your thirst.

wood.desc_short: Wood. Collected from trees and used in many crafting recipes. It's also needed to cook in camp-fires.

advancedcoolingtea.desc_short: An advanced cooling tea, provides hydration and temporarily decreases your max and core temperature.

coolingtea.desc_short: A basic cooling tea that temporarily decreases your max and core temperature.

purecoolingtea.desc_short: A pure cooling tea that temporarily decreases your max and core temperature.

advancedcraftingtea_quality.desc_short: An advanced crafting tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases the chances of a higher quality crafting outcome.

craftingtea_quality.desc_short: A basic crafting tea. provides hydration and increases the chances of a higher quality crafting outcome for a short time.

purecraftingtea_quality.desc_short: A pure crafting tea. provides hydration and increases the chances of a higher quality crafting outcome for a short time.

advanceharvestingtea.desc_short: An advanced harvesting tea, provides hydration and temporarily boosts the amount of resources you receive from harvesting corpses a moderate amount.

harvestingtea.desc_short: A basic harvesting tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases the amount of resources you receive from harvesting corpses a small amount.

pureharvestingtea.desc_short: A pure harvesting tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases the amount of resources you receive from harvesting corpses a large amount.

healingtea.advanced.desc_short: An advanced healing tea, provides hydration and heals you a moderate amount over time.

healingtea.desc_short: A basic healing tea, provides hydration and heals you a small amount over time.

healingtea.pure.desc_short: A pure healing tea, provides hydration and heals you a large amount over time.

maxhealthtea.advanced.desc_short: An advanced health tea, provides hydration and temporarily boosts maximum health a moderate amount.

maxhealthtea.desc_short: A basic health tea, provides hydration and temporarily boosts maximum health a small amount.

maxhealthtea.pure.desc_short: A pure health tea, provides hydration and temporarily boosts maximum health a large amount.

oretea.advanced.desc_short: An advanced ore tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases your yield from ores a moderate amount.

oretea.desc_short: A basic ore tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases your yield from harvesting ores a small amount.

oretea.pure.desc_short: A pure ore tea, provides hydration and temporarily increases your yield when harvesting ores a large amount.

radiationremovetea.advanced.desc_short: A tea that removes some radiation.

radiationremovetea.desc_short: A tea that removes some radiation.

radiationremovetea.pure.desc_short: A tea that removes some radiation.

radiationresisttea.advanced.desc_short: An advanced tea that provides some hydration and temporarily increases your resistance to radiation a moderate amount.

radiationresisttea.desc_short: A basic tea that provides hydration and temporarily increases your resistance to radiation a small amount.

radiationresisttea.pure.desc_short: A pure tea that provides hydration and temporarily increases your resistance to radiation a large amount.

scraptea.advanced.desc_short: An advanced scrap tea, temporarily increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels a moderate amount.

scraptea.desc_short: A basic scrap tea, temporarily increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels a small amount.

scraptea.pure.desc_short: A pure scrap tea, temporarily increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels a large amount.

supertea.desc_short: Super Serum,  more ore, more wood, more scrap

advancedwarmingtea.desc_short: An advanced warming tea that temporarily increases both your core and minimum temperature.

purewarmingtea.desc_short: A pure warming tea that temporarily increases both your core and minimum temperature.

warmingtea.desc_short: A basic warming tea that temporarily increases both your core and minimum temperature.

woodtea.advanced.desc_short: An advanced wood tea, temporarily increases the yield from cutting trees a moderate amount.

woodtea.desc_short: A basic wood tea, temporarily increases the yield from cutting trees a small amount.

woodtea.pure.desc_short: A pure wood tea, temporarily increases the yield from cutting trees a large amount.

antiradpills.desc_short: Taking these pills will lower your radiation level. WARNING: May cause extreme dehydration.

tool.binoculars.desc_short: Binoculars allowing you to see objects at great length.

explosive.timed.desc_short: C4, useful for breaking into bases.

tool.camera.desc_short: A camera. Take screenshots with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and lock focus with third fire.

compass.desc_short: A handy tool which indicates which direction you're facing. Will reveal your location on the map in Hardcore mode if equipped on your belt.

rf.detonator.desc_short: A hand held RF signal broadcaster. Left click to broadcast. Configurable with right mouse.

fishingrod.handmade.desc_short: Use [attack2] to cast out the line and wait for a bite. Requires bait.

flare.desc_short: Light up the night sky with this brand new red flare!

flashlight.held.desc_short: A powerful flashlight which illuminates your surroundings and can be used as a weapon.

geiger.counter.desc_short: A geiger counter used by scientists

handcuffs.desc_short: You're under arrest! Use on a surrendering or wounded player to keep them restrained. The wearer is blocked from using or holding items and can be pushed around.

hosetool.desc_short: A tool used to make fluid connections between objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection.

jackhammer.desc_short: A Pneumatic Jackhammer to blast through ore nodes. The sheer power of this device requires no aiming as all weak spots will be instantly destroyed. Works well on human flesh. Can be refilled at a Workbench.

keycard_blue.desc_short: A keycard with medium level clearance.

keycard_green.desc_short: A low level clearance card granting access to basic areas.

keycard_red.desc_short: A keycard with advanced clearance, grants access to top level areas

largemedkit.desc_short:
A large medkit that heals you to max health over time and stops any bleeding instantly.

Guarantees 100% recovery from the wounded state if placed in your toolbar.

concretehatchet.desc_short: A salvaged piece of concrete and rebar which can be used to harvest wood

concretepickaxe.desc_short: A salvaged piece of concrete and rebar with a sharp edge. Can be used to harvest Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore.

lumberjack.hatchet.desc_short: A prototype field hatchet, useful for gathering wood

lumberjack.pickaxe.desc_short: A prototype field pickaxe. Useful for gathering ore from rocks.

map.desc_short:
Helps you figure out where you are. You can annotate the map by right-clicking and drawing on it.


Drag the map into your belt bar to make it active. You will then be able to view the map by holding down the map button (G by default).

syringe.medical.desc_short: Heal yourself or others with this syringe. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.

metal.detector.desc_short: Detects metal objects which may otherwise be hidden. When the light flashes, or you hear a beep, aim to search for items. Increase the bar until a flag appears. Dig at the flag with a melee item to reveal what it is. Different areas yield different rewards

outbreak.sprayer.desc_short: An outbreak sprayer used by scientists

rf_pager.desc_short: An RF Pager. An audible tone will be produced when a signal is picked up on the listening frequency. Can be set to silent mode.

pipetool.desc_short: A tool used to make connections between industrial objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. Holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.

building.planner.desc_short: A building plan. You can use this to craft buildings - right click when equipped for more options.

shovel.desc_short: A shovel for digging up stuff

grenade.smoke.desc_short: Produces a large cloud of opaque greyish white smoke.

spraycan.desc_short: Use the Spray Can to leave Tags or reskin your items. Press [attack] to spray and [attack2] to reskin items.

supply.signal.desc_short: Purple signal smoke. Use to mark a location for an airdrop.

surveycharge.desc_short: Use this on the terrain to see which resources are available for mining.

walkietalkie.desc_short: A walkie talkie set to an unknown channel

wiretool.desc_short: A tool used to make connections between electrical objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. Holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.

vehicle.1mod.cockpit.desc_short: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger.

vehicle.1mod.cockpit.armored.desc_short: Single module armored cockpit for a driver and one passenger.

vehicle.1mod.cockpit.with.engine.desc_short: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger, with a small engine.

vehicle.1mod.passengers.armored.desc_short: Single module armored seating for two passengers.

vehicle.1mod.rear.seats.desc_short: Single module seating for two passengers.

vehicle.1mod.taxi.desc_short: Single module seating for two passengers, with protection at the front.

vehicle.2mod.camper.desc_short: Dual module camper that allows up to 4 players to respawn. Also includes a barbecue, a locker and a small box for item storage.

vehicle.car_radio.desc_short: A small radio to use in cars. Will only work while the car is turned on.

boombox.desc_short: A large speaker to play recorded cassette tapes which can also stream audio from the internet. Open the settings to change audio options.

fun.boomboxportable.desc_short: A portable Boom Box that can play tapes and internet audio streams. [attack] to start/stop and [attack2] to modify settings.

cassette.desc_short: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 30s of audio.

cassette.medium.desc_short: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 20s of audio.

cassette.short.desc_short: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 10s of audio.

fun.casetterecorder.desc_short: Insert a cassette and play the recorded audio with [attack], [attack2] to record new audio and [+reload] to throw.

discoball.desc_short: Get groovy with this stunning disco ball.

discofloor.desc_short: A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.

discofloor.largetiles.desc_short: A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.

connected.speaker.desc_short: A small speaker that will play any audio from a connected Boom Box.

laserlight.desc_short: A small device that shoots out visible lasers in time to music.

megaphone.desc_short: A megaphone that lets you broadcast your voice. [attack] to activate your voice.

microphonestand.desc_short: A powered microphone that lets you broadcast your voice. Press [+attack2] to change voice mode between high and low pitch.

mobilephone.desc_short: A mobile phone that lets you place calls from anywhere. Truly cutting edge Cobalt technology. Use [attack] to access the dialer.

soundlight.desc_short: A light that will pulse in time to music when connected to a Boom Box.

telephone.desc_short: Use the telephone to call other telephones on the island!

wallpaper.tool.desc_short:
Transform your base from a rusty shack to a cozy hideout! This tool lets you apply wallpaper on walls, floors and ceilings. A nice touch of style - until the next raid, at least.

Press [+attack2] to select your skin.

weapon.mod.8x.scope.desc_short: A large military-grade scope that can be configured from 4x zoom to 16x zoom.

weapon.mod.burstmodule.desc_short: A weapon attachment that modifies recoil and rate of fire. Allows weapon to fire in 3 round bursts when turned on. Use [+firemode] to toggle on or off.

weapon.mod.flashlight.desc_short: Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a beam of light. Pressing F (default) to toggle light.

weapon.mod.gascompressionovedrive.desc_short: An internal weapon mod which compresses and directs gasses used for cycling the weapon to the barrel, effectively increasing projectile velocity and damage at the expense of cycle rate.

weapon.mod.holosight.desc_short: Uses laser projection to create a holographic sight which is always pointing at the target regardless of view angle.

weapon.mod.lasersight.desc_short: Attaches to a weapon. Provides user with a guiding laser and reduces weapon sway.

weapon.mod.muzzleboost.desc_short: Increases weapon fire rate by channeling gasses back into the weapon cycling it faster, at the cost of bullet accuracy.

weapon.mod.muzzlebrake.desc_short: Lowers recoil felt by the operator but can make bullet path more unpredictable and dealing slightly less damage to your foes.

weapon.mod.simplesight.desc_short: A poorly made sight, slightly better than iron sights.

weapon.mod.oilfiltersilencer.desc_short: Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash. Fashioned out of an old oil filter, this won't last long.

weapon.mod.silencer.desc_short: Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash.

weapon.mod.sodacansilencer.desc_short: Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash. Crudely made out of a soda can, this will only survive a few shots.

weapon.mod.targetingattachment.desc_short: An internal weapon mod that allows the user to send pings to their team while the weapon is equipped.

rifle.ak.diver.desc_short: A waterlogged assault rifle from the abyss

rifle.ak.jungle.desc_short: Jungle Relic themed high damage machine rifle.

rifle.ak.med.desc_short: Medieval themed high damage machine rifle.

bandage.desc_short: Heal yourself or others with this bandage. Left-click heals you, right-click heals a target.

grenade.beancan.desc_short: An unreliable explosive grenade. Each one has a different length fuse, so you might lose some fingers. Can be used to make satchel charges.

grenade.bee.desc_short: A fragile glass jar full of bees. Breaking upon impact, the bees will find the nearest player to attack. Careful where you throw it!

blowpipe.desc_short: A blown weapon that fires darts with different effects.

blunderbuss.desc_short: A Shotgun with two barrels allowing two shots to be fired in quick succession before needing to reload.

rifle.bolt.desc_short: A High powered, highly accurate, long range rifle.

bone.club.desc_short: A blunt weapon made from a femur. All around basic gathering tool.

knife.bone.desc_short: Melee weapon crafted from bone fragments. Good for harvesting carcases.

knife.bone.obsidian.desc_short: Melee weapon crafted from obsidian. Good for harvesting carcases.

boomerang.desc_short: Can be used a melee weapon or as a throwable. Once thrown (with right click) it travels in an arc before coming back to you.

bow.hunting.desc_short: Hunting Bow, useful for short to medium range combat and hunting.

cakefiveyear.desc_short: A very special and happy birthday to Rust!

chainsaw.desc_short: A Chainsaw. Very effective at cutting trees in addition to soft fleshy objects. Requires Low Grade Fuel to run.

salvaged.cleaver.desc_short: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with high damage.

spear.cny.desc_short: A Chinese themed New Year themed metal Spear

bow.compound.desc_short: A very powerful bow. Can only be fully drawn while stationary. Keep still for bonus damage and speed.

diverhatchet.desc_short: Metal hatchet, reclaimed from the abyss, perfect for survival and crafting

diverpickaxe.desc_short: Plucked from the abyss, this Metal Pickaxe is a prized possession for any survivor

divertorch.desc_short: Illuminate the underwater depths with this durable and waterproof diving torch

shotgun.double.desc_short: A Shotgun with two barrels allowing two shots to be fired in quick succession before needing to reload.

pistol.eoka.desc_short: A very cheap, very ineffective, and very unreliable pistol that fires shells.

grenade.f1.desc_short: A reliable military grenade that can be thrown a short distance. Deadly at close range on detonation.

flamethrower.desc_short: A Flamethrower. Uses low grade fuel as ammunition.

grenade.flashbang.desc_short: A bright explosive device which blinds and disorients anyone near it upon detonation

frontier_hatchet.desc_short: A Frontier Hatchet, useful for chopping trees and dismembering corpses.

pistol.prototype17.desc_short: A protype pistol with a built-in 3 round burst fire mode. Strong in close quarters. Swap between single shot and burst with [+firemode]

multiplegrenadelauncher.desc_short: A 40MM six barrel, semi automatic grenade launcher

mace.baseballbat.desc_short: A baseball bat wrapped in barbed wire

knife.butcher.desc_short: A sharp butcher knife. Extremely good at harvesting flesh from both dead or alive bodies.

pitchfork.desc_short: A 3 pronged pitchfork. Extremely easy to hit targets with.

sickle.desc_short: A very sharp curved cutting weapon. While its traditional role was to cut grass, this tool is also extremely versatile at cutting throats, perhaps trees, too.

vampire.stake.desc_short: A stake adorned with special properties making it able to release the soul of undead creatures with a single strike, as well as yield extra loot from their remains.

hammer.desc_short: A Hammer, used to upgrade building materials. Right-click for the options. You can also pick up deployed objects while the hammer is equipped.

hatchet.desc_short: A Hatchet, useful for chopping trees and dismembering corpses.

hmlmg.desc_short: A hand made belt-fed light machine gun with high damage, high rate of fire, low accuracy during short bursts.

homingmissile.launcher.desc_short: An active-guidance homing missile launcher. Once launched, the target must be tracked by the launcher until impact. Can be distracted by flares.

improvised.shield.desc_short: A makeshift metal shield, sturdy but only protects a small area. Usable with single handed weapons and tools.

knife.combat.desc_short: Combat knife designed for close combat engagements, can attack while sprinting. Best in class at harvesting flesh.

sunken.knife.desc_short: A corroded sunken knife designed for close combat engagements, can attack while sprinting. Best in class at harvesting flesh.

rifle.l96.desc_short: A military grade high powered, long range rifle with great accuracy.

legacy bow.desc_short: Hunting Bow, useful for short to medium range combat and hunting.

rifle.lr300.desc_short: Stalk your enemies with this high powered light assault rifle.

lmg.m249.desc_short: High damage, high rate of fire, belt fed light machine gun.

shotgun.m4.desc_short: A semi automatic military issue shotgun

pistol.m92.desc_short: A semi-automatic Pistol. Fires rapidly and with good accuracy. Military Grade

mace.desc_short: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon, It's unique design makes it easier to hit your target when compared to other more traditional weapons.

machete.desc_short: A brutal weapon with good range.

metal.shield.desc_short: A large sturdy metal shield, keeps arrows and bullets at bay. Usable with single handed weapons and tools.

military flamethrower.desc_short: A Military grade flamethrower. Uses low grade fuel as ammunition.

minicrossbow.desc_short: A very accurate ranged weapon with a rotating barrel.

minigun.desc_short: A military issue belt-fed machine gun with that must be spun up to fire. Fires rapidly once spun up at the expense of movement speed.

grenade.molotov.desc_short: A glass bottle filled with low grade fuel. Smashes and spreads fire when it lands, incredibly high damage to wood and players but innefective against stronger materials.

paddle.desc_short: A versatile melee weapon that can also be used to paddle a kayak.

pickaxe.desc_short: A Pickaxe, useful for gathering ore from rocks.

shotgun.waterpipe.desc_short: A Shotgun. Fires a single round before reloading.

reinforced.wooden.shield.desc_short: A basic wooden shield with added protection, keeps you safe but not for long. Usable with single handed weapons and tools.

rock.desc_short: A Rock. The most basic melee weapon and gathering tool.

jungle.rock.desc_short: A Jungle Rock. The most basic melee weapon and gathering tool.

axe.salvaged.desc_short: A high-yield resource gathering axe. Slower than the Hatchet.

hammer.salvaged.desc_short: A Hammer made from a bunch of other crap.

explosive.satchel.desc_short: Small explosive package constructed of beancan grenades. Useful for destroying wood and sheet metal doors.

pistol.semiauto.desc_short: A semi-automatic pistol, fires rapidly and with good accuracy.

pistol.semiauto.a.m15.desc_short: A special issue Air Force semi-automatic pistol, fires rapidly and with good accuracy.

smg.2.desc_short: A rapid-firing Machine Gun. Sacrifices accuracy and distance for speed.

shotgun.spas12.desc_short: A semi automatic military issue shotgun

speargun.desc_short: A speargun which can only be fired underwater. Excellent for hunting Sharks.

stonehatchet.desc_short: Primitive tool used for harvesting wood from trees and logs.

stone.pickaxe.desc_short: Primitive tool used for harvesting Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore.

spear.stone.desc_short: A stone-tipped wooden Spear. Slightly longer range.

longsword.desc_short: A powerful 2-handed melee weapon with good range and high damage.

salvaged.sword.desc_short: A powerful melee weapon made from a filed-down wrench. Great durability, good damage.

t1_smg.desc_short: An extremely basic automatic firearm. Low damage and accuracy.

toolgun.desc_short: Celebrating 15 Years of Garry's Mod! Use this tool gun to upgrade building parts. Right-click for the options. You can also pick up deployed objects while the hammer is equipped.

torch.desc_short: A Torch. Lights your way at night and can be used as a weapon.

bucket.water.desc_short: A bucket for transporting water or other liquids.

wooden.shield.desc_short: A basic wooden shield, won't last very long. Usable with single handed weapons and tools.

spear.wooden.desc_short: Primitive weapon, perfect for hunting your foes. Can be upgraded to Stone Spear.
